Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [Admin] WHERE UserName = @UserName AND [Password] = @Password AND IsActive = 1) BEGIN SELECT @AdminID = AdminID FROM [Admin] WHERE UserName = @UserName AND [Password] = @Password END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE FROM Student_Table WHERE studentId = @studentId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE FROM Scenario WHERE ScenarioID = @ScenarioID END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DELETE FROM SubContent WHERE ParentID = @ParentId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; SELECT AD.FName AS FIRSTNAME, AD.LName AS LASTNAME, AD.EmailID AS EMAIL, AD.UserName AS USERNAME FROM Admin AD END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROC [dbo].[GET_ADMIN_PROFILE] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT ST.studentId AS STUDENTID,st.IsAllowEdit, (ST.firstName+ST.lastName) AS STUDENTNAME FROM Student_Table ST END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROC [dbo].[GET_STUDENT] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT CMT.Comments AS COMMENT, CMT.ScenarioID AS SCID, (ST.firstName+ST.lastName) AS STUDENTNAME, CMT.[Grade] AS GRADE, SC.Name AS LEVEL, CMT.CommentID AS COMMENTID
FROM Comment AS CMT
INNER JOIN
Scenario AS SC
ON CMT.ScenarioID = SC.ScenarioID
INNER JOIN
Student_Table AS ST
ON ST.[studentId] = CMT.StudentID END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROC [dbo].[GET_STUDENT_LIST_FOR_GRADE] AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; SELECT ST.firstName AS FIRSTNAME, ST.lastName AS LASTNAME, ST.email AS EMAIL, ST.userName AS USERNAME FROM Student_Table ST
WHERE ST.[studentId] = @studentId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
INSERT INTO Comment(ScenarioID, ContentID, StudentID, CreatedOn, IsActive,Comments) VALUES (@ScenarioID, @ContentID, @StudentID, GETDATE(), 1,@Comment) END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Scenario WHERE ScenarioID = @ScenarioID AND @ScenarioID != -1) BEGIN UPDATE Scenario SET Name = @Name, Welcome = @Welcome, LearnAbout = @LearnAbt,Desciption = @Desc,Details = @Details,[Rank]=@Rank,[Image] = @Image, IsCreatedByStudent = @IsCreatedByStudent, IsActive = 1 WHERE ScenarioID = @ScenarioID SET @NewScenarioID = @ScenarioID END
ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO Scenario(Name,Welcome,LearnAbout,Desciption, Details, [Rank],[Image], IsCreatedByStudent, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, IsActive) VALUES (@Name,@Welcome,@LearnAbt,@Desc, @Details,@Rank, @Image,@IsCreatedByStudent, @CreatedBy, GETDATE(), 1)
SET @NewScenarioID = SCOPE_IDENTITY(); END END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
SELECT
CT.Comments AS COMMENT, SC.Name AS LEVEL, CT.Grade AS GRADE
FROM Comment AS CT
INNER JOIN
Scenario AS SC
ON CT.ScenarioID = SC.ScenarioID
WHERE CT.StudentID = @studentId
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT CONT.ContentID AS ContentID, CONT.HeadingID AS HeadingID, CONT.HeadingText AS HeadingText, CONT.[Image] AS [Image], CONT.Contents AS Contents, CONT.HasCommentBox AS HasCommentBox, CONT.HasButtons AS HasButtons, CONT.Link1Caption as Link1Caption, CONT.Link2Caption as Link2Caption, CONT.Link3Caption as Link3Caption, CONT.Link4Caption as Link4Caption, CONT.Link5Caption as Link5Caption, CONT.Link6Caption as Link6Caption, cont.Link1Description as Link1Description, cont.Link2Description as Link2Description, cont.Link3Description as Link3Description, cont.Link4Description as Link4Description, cont.Link5Description as Link5Description, cont.Link6Description as Link6Description FROM Content AS CONT WHERE CONT.IsActive = 1 AND (CONT.ContentID = @ContentID OR @ContentID IS NULL) END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT CONT.ContentID AS ContentID, CONT.HeadingID AS HeadingID, CONT.HeadingText AS HeadingText FROM Content AS CONT INNER JOIN ScenarioContent AS SC ON CONT.ContentID = SC.ContentID WHERE CONT.IsActive = 1 AND (SC.ScenarioID = @ScenarioID) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
SELECT CONT.ContentID AS ContentID, CONT.HeadingID AS HeadingID, CONT.HeadingText AS HeadingText FROM SubContent AS SC INNER JOIN Content AS CONT ON SC.ChildID = CONT.ContentID WHERE SC.ParentID = @ContentID END

Property.Name: DefaultExpressionScript
Property.Value: NULL

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON;
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [dbo].[Student_Table] WHERE userName = @UserName AND [Password] = @Password AND IsActive = 1) BEGIN SELECT @StudentId = studentId, @IsAllowEdit=IsAllowEdit FROM [dbo].[Student_Table] WHERE userName = @UserName AND [Password] = @Password END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN UPDATE Admin SET FName = @firstName, LName = @lastName, EmailID = @email, UserName = @userName
WHERE UserName = @userName; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN UPDATE Comment
SET Grade = @grade
WHERE CommentID = @commentId; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN UPDATE Student_Table
SET IsAllowEdit = @IsAllowEdit
WHERE studentId = @StudenttId; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN UPDATE Student_Table
SET firstName = @firstName, lastName = @lastName, email = @email, userName = @userName
WHERE userName = @userName; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
